short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A notepad that can take notes, extract web pages, and save web page content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A notepad that can take notes, extract web pages.
After installing the plug-in and refreshing the webpage, you can save the selected content by right-clicking, also open the plug-in background by pressing Ctrl+Shift+Y.
